title: Lotus Energy Lemonade Concentrate
description: Shop Lotus Energy Lemonade Concentrate at Lotus Energy. Made with natural ingredients, great taste, made with real lemons, and contains adaptogens, natural caffeine from green tea, natural ingredients, and is sweetened with pure cane sugar.
cleaned_text: In love with this! I was a little worried thinking I wouldn't d like it as much as the blue and red, and I was wrong. The flavor tastes just like lemonade and it goes well with all sorts of flavors. Most definitely adding it to my daily rotation. |Taste|| | Rated 5 out of 5 |Quality|| | Rated 5 out of 5 |Results|| | Rated 5 out of 5 Lotus Energy Hello Jessica! It's wonderful to hear you ended up liking Lotus Energy Lemonade Concentrate as much as the blue and red flavors. We love hearing that you found the flavor to be spot-on, and that it goes well with all sorts of flavors. Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this amazing review. Best, Lotus Energy Drinks
